DOC.brief_title: Effect Zydena ( Udenafil ) Cerebral Blood Flow Peripheral Blood Viscosity
DOC.detailed_description: Udenafil newly develop selective phosphodiesterase type 5 inhibitor ( PDE5i ) . Since PDE5i known relax smooth muscle cell , suggest PDE5i may dilate cerebral vessel lead increase cerebral blood flow . The main mechanism subcortical vascular cognitive impairment hypoperfusion brain . Therefore , study , investigator investigate whether Udenafil increase cerebral blood flow also low peripheral blood viscosity normal subcortical vascular cognitive impairment subject .
